```{r, include = F}
db <- exa::jdbc()
```

```{sql, connection = db}
select * from regions limit 10
```

```{r}
region <- 10
```

```{sql, connection = db, max.print = 3, tab.cap = 'Some Car Colors'}
select * from regions where region > ?region order by 1 desc
```

```{sql, connection = db, output.var = 'car_colors'}
select * from regions
```

```{r}
knitr::kable(car_colors)
```
